#summary How-To install Antlr V3 IDE Plug-In in Eclipse

= Requirements =

  * Eclipse 3.5+ (Ganymede, Galileo...)
  * DLTK - Repository: http://download.eclipse.org/technology/dltk/updates/
  * ZEST - Repository: http://download.eclipse.org/tools/gef/updates/releases/
  * AntlrV3IDE - Repository: http://antlrv3ide.sourceforge.net/
  * Subclipse - Repository: http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x

= Details =

  # Extract Eclipse in your preferred path
  # Via Update Manager, add the repositories and install DLTK, ZEST, GEF
  # Via Update Manager, add AntlrV3IDE
